title: Zygor Guides 4.0.7754 (January 2nd, 2014)
description:
Zygor Guides update 4.0.7754, Released on: January 2nd, 2014 (Horde and Alliance)

Created by r4tulan on Thursday 2nd of January 2014 11:05:41 PM

Install instructions: 

1) DO NOT USE THE OFFICIAL ZYGOR LAUNCHER FOR ANY REASON.

2) Extract the .zip and drop the ZygorGuidesViewer folder into your WoW/Interface/Addons folder and overwrite the current installation.


Mac-Only install instructions:

1) Put the ZygorGuidesViewer folder in Hard Drive/Applications/World of Warcraft/Interface/AddOns.

2) (Optional) Open World of Warcraft, login, click the Addons button on the Character Select Screen, make sure Zygor is selected, and check the "Load out of date addons" box. Some users have stated that this step is rarely/never necessary


Changelog:

-------


[H] Leveling
Krasarang Wilds:
Made minor changes throughout to improve guide consistency

Kun-lai Summit:
Added helpful tips
Corrected a quest npc's waypoint
Removed duplicate guide step
Corrected step that wasn't working correctly
Corrected step that wasn't showing in guide
Corrected typo that caused the guide to display the wrong quest for turn in
Added additional waypoints for extra quest mobs
Linked quest item to guide

[H] Professions
Fixed an issue regarding a wrong spell ID in the Cooking/Fishing guide

[B] Professions
Fixed all reported issues in the Cooking 525-600 guide
